SV Health Investors

SV Health Investors is a specialist healthcare fund manager investing across multiple stages and sectors. Their goal is to transform healthcare through investments in promising ventures led by strong management teams. They have a 30-year track record in the US and UK.

Offices: Boston (United States), London (United Kingdom)

Investment Stages: Series A, Series B, Series C

Markets: Biotechnology, Dementia, Medical Devices, Healthcare Services, Digital Health

Founded Year: 1993

Investor Type: Venture Capital, Private Equity

Portfolio Companies: AdvanCell, Harness Therapeutics, Doctors of Physical Therapy, Adapthealth, Adimab, Alchemab, Alektor, Alpheus Medical, Amphista Therapeutics, Artios Pharma, Astronautx Ltd,
